page.title: 02EDUCATION PAISLEY
page.content: The {Mary Russell School}was opened in 1968.It is one of two {Special {Education Schools}in the area.The roll is around 219 with a capacity for 361.It was purpose-built to accommodate {mentally and physically {handicapped}children.The maximum no. of mentally handicapped children in a class is 10,for physically handicapped 8.The school is staffed by 23 teachers,2 full-time nurses and 2 nursing auxiliaries. {Subjects taught}include Home Economics, Woodwork and P.E.and there are visiting teachers for Business Studies, Art and Music. A bus, provided free, takes the under-16's to the school. There is also a{special unit}in the school for over-16's which at present has 26 children. { }
